Welcome Armchair Detective

… to your home on the web for the best, most thrilling and fun murder mystery & crime fiction — from classics & cozies, hardboiled or noir, amateur & pro sleuths, authors you love and authors you've never heard of (but should've!) …

This site is here for readers — like you — who love nothing more than curling up with their favorite detective and getting lost in a good story!

What are you looking for today?

Whether you like hardboiled tough guys slugging it out with the scum of the earth in dark, big-city alleyways, or genteels old ladies peeking through windows and snooping around sleepy little hamlets to uncover murder for passion & profit …

Got 5 mins to an hour to kill?
Explore Short Stories: read online or download.
Enjoying a couple hours on a lazy Saturday afternoon?
Buy a Novella to read on your favorite ereader device or app.
A long winter's eve with nothing worth watching on the idiot box?
Purchase a thrilling Novel and get lost in good story.
Interested in the history of mysteries or want more about an author?
Check out the articles & essays in the MurderWiki & learn something new.
Want to stay up-to-date with the newest stories?
Check out the Subscriptions for free and paid newsletters & subscriber-only specials.

Your satisfaction and enjoyment of any story on TalesofMurder.com, whether free online, downloaded, or purchased, is guaranteed.
If you ever decide a story isn't for you, simply contact Support using the floating bar to your left or at the bottom of your screen and we'll be happy to refund 100% of your money or give you a free story of the same type in exchange.

Allow me introduce myself …

I am Atticus, aka the Murderous Crow. And I'm your host on TalesofMurder.com and guide to the exciting world of classic and out-of-print murder mystery & crime fiction published on this site. I'm here to help you uncover the best short stories, novellas & novels you've ever read.

Should you decide to sign up for any of our subscriptions or buy a product, you'll be getting an email from me. And if you ever have any questions, comments, or complaints, just drop me a line using the handy & secure contact form, below.

I'll be in touch as necessary and am around if you have any questions … but enough about me for now!

You're here to find something good to read! Am I right? So …

Pick your poison!
